text: Olav Aslakson Versto (22 June 1892 - 13 June 1977) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. He was born in Rauland. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Telemark in 1928, and was re-elected on eight occasions. Versto was a member of the executive committee of Vinje municipality from 1919 to 1931 and 1947 to 1955. Between 1931 and 1937 he served as deputy mayor. He was also a member of Telemark county council in 1945. ==References== * Category:1892 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Olav Aslakson Versto
